short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select text and search with one click
short.zh_CN: 选择文字，一键直接搜索

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a powerful and flexible Chrome browser extension designed to enhance your web browsing and information search experience. Key features include:

1. Quick Search: Simply select any text on a webpage and a customized search engine icon will appear. Click the icon to search the selected content using the corresponding search engine in a new tab.
2. Customizable Search Engines: You can add, edit, or delete search engines. Each search engine can be configured with a name, icon (supporting emojis or image URLs), and a search URL.
3. Cloud Configuration: Supports downloading preset search engine configurations from the cloud, making it easy to set up multiple commonly used search engines quickly.
4. Flexible Display: You can choose to show or hide specific search engine icons to suit your personal preferences.
5. User-Friendly: A simple configuration interface that is intuitive and easy to use, supporting one-click save and update of settings.

Whether you are a student, researcher, or a regular internet user, this extension can significantly improve your search efficiency, making information easily accessible. After installation, you will experience unparalleled convenience in searching!
long.zh_CN:
这是一个强大而灵活的 Chrome 浏览器扩展，旨在提升您的网页浏览和信息搜索体验。主要功能包括：
1. 快速搜索：只需选中网页上的任何文字，即可立即看到自定义的搜索引擎图标。点击图标即可在新标签页中使用相应的搜索引擎搜索选中的内容。
2. 自定义搜索引擎：您可以添加、编辑或删除搜索引擎。每个搜索引擎可以设置名称、图标（支持 emoji 或图片 URL）和搜索 URL。
3. 云端配置：支持从云端下载预设的搜索引擎配置，方便快速设置多个常用搜索引擎。
4. 灵活显示：可以选择显示或隐藏特定的搜索引擎图标，以满足个人使用习惯。
5. 用户友好：简洁的配置界面，直观易用，支持一键保存和更新配置。
无论您是学生、研究人员、还是普通网络用户，这个扩展都能大大提高您的搜索效率，让信息触手可及。安装后，您将体验到前所未有的便捷搜索体验！
